name: SpellonthePhone
0:
”Alexa, start spell phone and introduction”
”I would like examples”
”more exercises please”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spell phone
des: Welcome to the Alexa 'Spell on the Phone' Skill. Would it not be great: if you spoke clearly on the phone? This Skill helps you to do exactly that, by avoiding confusion, when spelling on the phone. It is based on the official international spelling alphabet, used by I.C.A.O, I.T.U and ANSI.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
